casebody.data:
The State ex rel. Fant v. Board of Trustees, [Greater Cleveland] Regional Transit Authority, Appellee.

[Cite as State ex rel. Fant v. Bd. of Trustees, Greater Cleveland Regional Transit Auth. (1994), 68 Ohio St.3d 505.]

(No. 93-2265 Submitted February 22, 1994 Decided March 23, 1994.) Henry J. Fant, pro se. Edward J. Opett, for appellee.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed.

Moyer, C.J., A.W. Sweeney, Douglas, Wright, Resnick, F.E; Sweeney and Pfeifer, JJ., concur.
